body_html:
Ok, sleeping on it, I understood that it would make sense to do gradients/, gradients_1/, gradients_2/, etc. since it is the best way to distinguish ops created by separate calls of TF_AddGradients.

I have some suggestion in mind to make all that clear, I'll ping you soon to talk about it, thanks.

I have some suggestion in mind to make all that clear, I'll ping you soon to talk about it, thanks.
body:
Ok, sleeping on it, I understood that it would make sense to do `gradients/, gradients_1/, gradients_2/, etc.` since it is the best way to distinguish ops created by separate calls of `TF_AddGradients`.

I have some suggestion in mind to make all that clear, I'll ping you soon to talk about it, thanks.
